maqras.text: 76|19|Xuduo changsheng bulao de shaonian, lunliuzhe fushi tamen. Dang ni kanjian naxie shaonian de shihou, ni yiwei tamen shi xie sanman de zhenzhu.
76|20|Dang ni guankan nali de shihou, ni hui kanjian enze he daguo.
76|21|Tamen jiang chuanzhuo ling luo jinduan de lu pao, tamen jiang xiangshou yin zhuo de zhuangshi, tamen de zhu, jiang yi chunjie de yinliao shangci tamen.
76|22|(Jiang dui tamen shuo)“zhe que shi nimen de baochou, nimen de laoji shi you baochou de.”
76|23|Wo que yi jiang “gulanjing” lingxing di jiang shi ni,
76|24|gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue. Ni buyao shuncong tamen zhong renhe fanzui de ren, huo gu en de ren.
76|25|Ni yingdang zhaoxi jinian ni de zhu de zun ming,
76|26|yeli, ni yingdang yi xiao bu fen shijian xiang ta koutou, yi da bu fen shijian zansong ta.
76|27|Zhe deng ren dique shi aihao xianshi, er hushi weilai de yanzhong de yi ri
76|28|wo chuangzaole tamen, bing shi tamen de tige jianshi. Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang yi xiang tamen yiyang de ren daiti tamen.
76|29|Zhe que shi jiaohui, shei yuanyi juewu, shei keyi xuanze yitiao tongda ta de zhu de daolu.
76|30|Chu an la yiyu wai, nimen jue bu yiyu. An la shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.
76|31|Ta shi tasuo yiyu de ren, ru zai ta de ci'en zhong. Zhiyu bu yi de ren, ta yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa.
77|1|Shi yi feng pai chuanda jiayin,
77|2|sui menglie chui dong zhe,
77|3|shi yi chuanbo ge wu,
77|4|er shi zhi fensan,
77|5|nai chuanshou jiaoxun zhe,
77|6|shi yi shi yuanliang huo jinggao zhe,
77|7|jinggao nimen de shi, shi biding fasheng de.
77|8|Dang xingsu andan de shihou,
77|9|dangtian ti polie de shihou,
77|10|dang shanluan feiyang de shihou,
77|11|dangzhong shizhe bei dingqi zhaoji de shihou,
77|12|qixian zai na ri ne?
77|13|Zai panjue zhi ri.
77|14|Ni zen neng zhidao panjue zhi ri, shi shenme?
77|15|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
77|16|Nandao wo meiyou huimie xian min ma?
77|17|Ranhou, wo shi hou min sui tamen er xiaomie.
77|18|Wo jiang zheyang chuzhi fanzui de ren.
77|19|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
77|20|Nandao wo meiyou yong boruo de jingye chuangzao nimen ma?
77|21|Wo ba ta fang zai yige jiangu de anxi zhi suo,
77|22|dao yige dingqi.
77|23|Wo ceng panding, wo shi shanyu panding de.
77|24|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
77|25|Nandao wo meiyou shi dadi chengwei baoluo
77|26|huo wu he si wu de ma?
77|27|Wo ceng zai dadishang, anzhi xuduo chonggao de shanluan. Wo ceng shangci nimen ganmei de yinliao.
77|28|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
77|29|“Nimen qu xiangshou nimen fouren de xingfa ba!
77|30|Nimen qu xiangshou yousan ge cha de yin ying ba!”
77|31|Na yin ying bushi yinliang de, buneng zhedang huoyan de relang.
77|32|Na huoyan penshe chu gongdian ban de huoxing,
77|33|haoxiang lihei de luotuo yiyang.
77|34|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
77|35|Zhe shi tamen bude fayan zhi ri.
77|36|Tamen bu meng xuke, gu buneng daoqian.
77|37|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
77|38|Zhe shi panjue zhi ri, wo ba nimen he xian min jihe zai yi chu.
77|39|Ruguo nimen you she me jimou, nimen ke dui wo yong ji.
77|40|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
77|41|Jingwei de renmen, biding zai shu yin zhi xia, qingquan zhi bin,
77|42|xiangshou tamen ai chi de shuiguo,
77|43|jiang dui tamen shuo:“Nimen cengjing xingshan, gu nimen tongkuai di yinshi ba!”
77|44|Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan zhe.
77|45|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
77|46|Nimen zhanshi chihe xiangshou ba! Nimen que shi fanzui de ren.
77|47|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
77|48|Youren dui tamen shuo: Nimen dang jugong. Tamen bu ken jugong.
77|49|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
77|50|Chu “gulanjing” wai, tamen yao xinyang shenme wenci ne?
